title: 47. Skincare Ingredients (Part II) With Esthetician + Educator Michele Phelan.
description:
Hi Roomies,

In this episode I'm BACK with Michele Phelan, esthetician, educator, CIDESCO diploma and owner of Concepts Institute.

Michele Phelan has been a licensed, practicing esthetician for over 30 years. She has taught esthetics at every level including; State Board, clinical/medical and CIDESCO. Michele writes the core curriculum and teaches the Clinical esthetics portion of our innovative and highly advanced program. Michele holds a B.A. Business Administration from SFSU and is also a certified nutrition coach.

Learn More About Concepts Institute or take a class

Instagram: @conceptsinstitute

In this episode, we pick up part 2 of our ingredients episode and cover ingredients such as:

+ Niacinamide

+ mandalic acid

+ azaleic acid

+ hyaluronic acid


Thank you to today's sponsors:

Alpen Glow Skin Spa by Courtney Parkhill.

You can use TESSAGLOW for 20% off your purchase!
